In tut1.m, it says that I can set Entropy and Volume as a pair, 
however, I can't seem to make this happen in practice.  This is what 
happens for a simple example:

clear all
gas = IdealGasMix('gri30.cti');
set(gas,'S',7776,'V',(1/4.811),'X','O2:1');
T2 = temperature(gas)
s2 = entropy_mass(gas)
d2 = density(gas)

results in:

T2 = 300
s2 = 6.0768e+003
d2 = 4.8110

If the program were to actually hold entropy fixed, a temperature of 
about 2500 would result.  Can anyone please tell me what I'm doing 
wrong?

Rob Cook
HTGL Stanford University
robtpt@...
